Class ArrayHelper

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ArrayHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class contains helper methods for arrays.
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    "Frank Zechert", "Danny Maasch", kaworu

    • Method Detail

      • isTargetOfAssignment

        public static boolean isTargetOfAssignment(ArrayIdentifierNode node)
        Check if the given arrayIdentifierNode is used as the target of an assignment. The target of an assignment is the right hand side value (assignment: target = source)
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check
        Returns:
        true if the node is target of an assignment.

      • getBaseType

        public static Type getBaseType(Type type)
        Get the base type of the given derived type. The base type of an ArrayType is the inner most type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to get the base type for.
        Returns:
        The base type of the given type.

      • isOuterMostDimension

        public static boolean isOuterMostDimension(ArrayIdentifierNode node)
        Check if the given node is the outer most dimension of an array.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check
        Returns:
        true if the given node is the outer most dimension of an array.
